solution_line_template: And an additional {jupiter_delay_minutes} minutes after {jupiter_intermediate_hour}:{jupiter_intermediate_minute} AM is {jupiter_intermediate_hour}:{jupiter_intermediate_minute}+0:{jupiter_delay_minutes} = {jupiter_appearance_hour}:{jupiter_appearance_minute} AM.

And {uranus_delay_minutes} minutes after {uranus_intermediate_hour}:{uranus_intermediate_minute} AM is {uranus_intermediate_hour}:{uranus_intermediate_minute}+0:{uranus_delay_minutes} = {uranus_intermediate_hour}:{uranus_intermediate_minute_plus_delay} AM = {uranus_appearance_hour}:{uranus_appearance_minute} AM.
Thus, {uranus_appearance_hour}:{uranus_appearance_minute} AM is {minutes_after_6am} minutes after {reference_hour}:00 AM.
